partners: Banks, financial institutions, payment processors, merchants, e-commerce platforms

unfairAdvantage: Strong brand recognition, extensive partnerships, advanced security features, global reach

commonGoals: Facilitating secure and efficient global commerce
personalGoals: Expanding the reach and capabilities of the Visa network
purpose: Connecting the world through secure and reliable electronic payments
values: Innovation, security, reliability, and global acceptance

rulesAndActivities: Adhering to industry regulations, maintaining security and privacy standards, fostering innovation

weaknessesAndRisks: Competition, regulatory changes, emerging payment technologies, potential security breaches

buyerChannels: Partner banks, financial institutions, payment processors, merchants, and e-commerce platforms
